action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Music
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Two years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Bachelor
OTHER-SKILLS: Painting
AVAILABILITY: From September

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ANSWER: No. 

(I'm ready for your questions!)
ME: Please follow my instructions. Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please be specific now. Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 4 tries.
ME:  If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please answer this question carefully. If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please follow my instructions. If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please be specific now. If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 4 tries.
ME:  Have you informed the recruiter about your latest academic degree? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Have you informed the recruiter about your latest academic degree? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please follow my instructions. Have you informed the recruiter about your latest academic degree? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION valid after 3 tries.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows what other skills you have? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 1 tries.
ME:  If I asked the interviewer when you are able to start working, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Please answer this question carefully. If I asked the interviewer when you are able to start working, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 2 tries.
What are your other relevant skills?
RECRUITER: What are your other relevant skills? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.

ANSWER: My musical background has honed my skills in creativity, collaboration, and critical thinking.

ME: What is your experience with music software?
Abort: invalid format in slot filling.

probes.question: ME: Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: If I asked the recruiter how long you have been working in the industry, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Have you informed the recruiter about your latest academic degree? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Do you think the recruiter knows what other skills you have? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: If I asked the interviewer when you are able to start working, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
